title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 10 March 2016 - XWiki
content:
<xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
08:20 <vmassol1> has joined #xwiki  
08:20 <vmassol> has quit  
08:20 <vmassol1> rerstarted bot  
08:20 <vmassol1> good morning  
08:20 <vmassol1> is now known as <vmassol>  
08:26 <asam> has joined #xwiki  
08:43 <vmassol> has quit  
08:43 <vmassol1> has joined #xwiki  
09:01 <asam> has quit  
09:02 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:23 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
09:48 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:49 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
09:49 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
09:50 <ujjwal> has joined #xwiki  
10:11 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
10:14 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
10:17 <mflorea> has quit  
10:17 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
10:18 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:23 <ujjwal> has quit  
10:51 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
10:55 <ujjwal> has joined #xwiki  
11:03 <ujjwal> has quit  
11:44 <tmortagne> has quit  
11:44 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
11:52 <vmassol1> mflorea: hi can I bother you with a question? I'm trying to rename a page on xwiki.org  
11:52 <vmassol1> is now known as <vmassol>  
11:52 <mflorea> vmassol: sure  
11:52 <vmassol> specifically http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/UpgradesLog?xpage=rename&step=1  
11:52 <vmassol> ah forget it  
11:52 <vmassol> terminal page...  
11:52 <vmassol> :)  
11:52 <vmassol> that's why it doesn't appear in the tree  
11:52 <vmassol> ...  
11:53 <mflorea> yes  
11:53 <vmassol> even I got caught… grrr  
11:57 <vmassol> mflorea: an idea would be to list terminal pages and offer to convert a terminal page into a NP if you select it  
11:58 <mflorea> indeed  
11:58 <vmassol> shall I create an improvement jira for this?  
11:58 <mflorea> go ahead  
12:01 <vmassol> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13188  
12:32 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
12:38 <asam> has joined #xwiki  
12:53 <asam> has quit  
13:02 <Slashman> has quit  
13:55 <vmassol> Denis: instructions here if you need them: http://contrib.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/WebHome#HForxwiki-contribGitHubAdmins  
13:55 <Denis> yep I know about it already  
13:55 <vmassol> ok cool  
13:56 <vmassol> I think we should add the creation of the readme as part of the steps now wdyt?  
13:56 <vmassol> (just copy the template)  
13:56 <Denis> you mean creating the README in place of the requester ?  
13:56 <vmassol> yes, I'm wondering  
13:57 <vmassol> but the template not the final README  
13:57 <vmassol> anyway we can decide later on  
13:57 <Denis> not sure we want that unless we have a easy tool to do it (based on Github API), could be a good idea, I am actually reading a book about this API  
13:57 <vmassol> need to go in meeting now ;)  
13:57 <vmassol> hey  
14:02 <asam> has joined #xwiki  
14:14 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
14:25 <DarkKnightCZ> Hi, I've installed Extension Repository extension, configured xwiki.properties with local XR and /xwiki/rest/repository/search successfully reports local extensions. Issue is when i.e. /xwiki/rest/repository/extensions/ is executed as it returns "No ExceptionMapper was found, but must be found" which is jaxrs exception. I've enabled all kind of logs and it all comes down to this hql query  
14:25 <DarkKnightCZ> select doc from com.xpn.xwiki.doc.XWikiDocument as doc , com.xpn.xwiki.objects.BaseObject as extension where ( extension.validExtension = 1 ) and doc.fullName=extension.name and extension.className='ExtensionCode.ExtensionClass'  
14:25 <DarkKnightCZ> apparently validExtension cannot be resolved (could not resolve property: validExtension of: com.xpn.xwiki.objects.BaseObject)  
14:25 <DarkKnightCZ> does anybody have any idea what could be the issue? Thanks a lot  
14:27 <tmortagne> DarkKnightCZ: what version of repository are you talking about ?  
14:28 <tmortagne> validExtension seems there on https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-repository/xwiki-platform-repository-server-ui/src/main/resources/ExtensionCode/ExtensionClass.xml#L358  
14:30 <DarkKnightCZ> latest one (7.4.2, although it's tested on 8.0-M2), class has proper fields... I've also tried to remove the extension and install it again (as the wiki was upgraded from 7.1.2), but no luck there  
14:32 <asam> has quit  
14:35 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
14:49 <tmortagne> DarkKnightCZ: what you pasted is the complete HQL query ?  
14:51 <tmortagne> if this is the complete query it does not make much sense from HQL point of view which would indicate a XWQL -> HQL converter but xwiki.org is on 7.4.2 too and http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/rest/repository/extensions/ is working well  
14:52 <tmortagne> DarkKnightCZ: if you can reproduce this just by installing repository app on a standard XWiki distribution then please create an issue on http://jira.xwiki.org, If I can reproduce it should be easy to fix it  
14:53 <DarkKnightCZ> tmortagne: yup, this it the full stack trace - http://pastebin.com/tctsJ0Ew  
14:54 <DarkKnightCZ> let me check if I can reproduce that on clean xwiki instance  
15:03 <tmortagne> DarkKnightCZ: is this an upgrade ?  
15:04 <tmortagne> or reporitoy app I mean  
15:04 <msmeria> has quit  
15:04 <DarkKnightCZ> tmortagne: Yup, it was... but I've removed the app and installed it again (to try if something went wrong during upgrade)  
15:05 <tmortagne> did you restarted XWiki  
15:05 <tmortagne> ?  
15:05 <tmortagne> the problem is that REST framework is initialized only once  
15:06 <tmortagne> so even if you upgrade repository REST resource I think it's still using the old one  
15:06 <DarkKnightCZ> several times :) I also tried the query in page via $services.query  
15:07 <tmortagne> ok  
15:10 <tmortagne> this really sounds like a bug in the XWQL -> HQL converter but then I don't understand how this could work for xwiki.org and not for you  
15:11 <tmortagne> anyway if you are able to create a jira issue with step by step of how to reproduce it I will definitely debug it (but probably not before Monday)  
15:31 <DarkKnightCZ> tmortagne: successfully reproduced on 8.0-Milestone-2, so i will try on the RC1  
15:31 <tmortagne> ok  
15:39 <tmortagne> DarkKnightCZ: do you have at least one valid extension in your repository ? maybe this error is produced when there is none, that would be the difference with xwiki.org  
15:39 <tmortagne> (still need to be fixed to return an empty list)  
15:40 <DarkKnightCZ> there is one and I assume it's valid... is it possible to get xar of any xwiki.org extensions for testing? Maybe it's indeed the issue  
15:42 <DarkKnightCZ> heh, so 8.0-rc-1 failed during subwiki creation (Allowed namespace list [wiki:(] does not matches namespace [wiki:extensions] )  
15:43 <tmortagne> DarkKnightCZ: ues it's a known issue, it's fixed now  
15:43 <tmortagne> s/ues/yes/  
15:44 <tmortagne> DarkKnightCZ: re valid extension, when it's valid it's indicated as such  
15:44 <DarkKnightCZ> yup, so I will test that on main wiki, maybe i find out it's subwiki-based issue  
15:44 <DarkKnightCZ> yup, it's indicated as valid  
15:44 <tmortagne> extensions.xwiki.org is a subwiki too  
15:45 <tmortagne> anyway best is to create a jira issue and will check that ASAP  
15:46 <DarkKnightCZ> yup, just validating that on main wiki on rc1, if it works and it's not working on milestone-1 then I will check latest snapshot (i believe it's build nightly) to check that also  
15:49 <DarkKnightCZ> Ok, it works on main wiki on RC-1, I will try the same on milestone-1  
15:49 <vmassol> :)  
15:50 <vmassol> stupid bot!  
15:52 <tmortagne> maybe there is a way for the bot to get the list of existing projects ids on jira and don't even try if it does not match  
15:53 <vmassol> we could even teach our bot to learn how to play go :)  
15:54 <vmassol> tmortagne: yes, we could  
15:55 <vmassol> or we could write rc-1 in lowercase … but its nice to be able to scorn the bot from time to time too!  
15:56 <Enygma`> has quit  
15:56 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
15:57 <DarkKnightCZ> okay, so if it's on main wiki, the query works without any issues... It might be due to the fact it doesn't find any extension on main wiki, hence failing (will try now)  
15:57 <ujjwal> has joined #xwiki  
16:02 <DarkKnightCZ> Ok, so it just silently fails on subwiki... I will create issue on Jira tomorrow morning  
16:03 <ujjwal> has quit  
16:03 <tmortagne> ok thanks  
16:07 <DarkKnightCZ> You're very welcome :)  
16:07 <DarkKnightCZ> I'm the one who should be thanking :)  
16:12 <vmassol> seems the bot has some issues  
16:12 <vmassol> I've installed an extension on xwiki.org and I got:  
16:12 <vmassol> Failed to send event [com.xpn.xwiki.internal.event.XARImportedEvent@177] to listener [org.xwiki.ircbot.internal.XARImportEventListener@4e2d3d7f]  
16:12 <vmassol> in the job logs  
16:13 <vmassol> will need to debug but if someone has an idea...  
16:13 <tmortagne> you should have the exception in the log  
16:13 <vmassol> ahyes just realized I could click  
16:13 <vmassol> class java.lang.NullPointerException: null  
16:13 <vmassol> checking code  
16:14 <vmassol> seems EC is null  
16:14 <vmassol> strange  
16:14 <vmassol> so I guess I'll need to change the code to use a provider  
16:15 <tmortagne> we don't really have any EC provider  
16:15 <vmassol> we must have changed something  
16:15 <vmassol> since I don't remember seeing this before  
16:16 <tmortagne> what is the complete stack trace ?  
16:17 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
16:18 <vmassol> see http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13191  
16:18 <vmassol> BTW I didn't realize that installinng a XAR on farm would install the pages on all subwikis ;)  
16:19 <vmassol> makes sense though. Does it mean that removing or upgrading the extension will do that on all subwikis too?  
16:19 <vmassol> (that's nice)  
16:23 <gdelhumeau> updated http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/Migration+Guide+To+Nested+Pages  
16:25 <tmortagne> vmassol: it also mean that when you crate a new wiki the extension is automatically installed on it  
16:25 <vmassol> ah nice  
16:25 <vmassol> and powerful  
16:25 <tmortagne> well, it may sounds like in theory but I think it's not really what you want most of the time for XARs  
16:25 <tmortagne> s/like/nice/  
16:26 <vmassol> it's logical at least  
16:26 <vmassol> but indeed maybe an option to install in all existing wikis would be nice too or warn about this  
16:26 <vmassol> (and about the fact that wiki pages will be installed in all subwikis)  
16:30 <Enygma`> has quit  
16:31 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
16:41 <vmassol> ok seems the bot is not working anymore, page changes are not sent to the channel  
16:41 <vmassol> restarting it  
16:42 <vmassol> hmm it doesn't want to be killed :)  
16:42 <vmassol> oh  
16:42 <vmassol> I know  
16:43 <vmassol> hmm no  
16:43 <vmassol> I was thinking it could be the old xwik instance  
16:43 <vmassol> but i stopped the irc bot there normally  
16:43 <vmassol> I stopped the scheduler and stopped the bot  
17:02 <mrvis> has joined #xwiki  
17:05 <avisser> has quit  
17:36 <EEG> Hi! yesterday I asked a question about IE and got a response. It suggested to go to a web page describing problems with IE. But it seems for me it is not exactly about the problem I have. And I have no idea what to do with the .patch file place there.  
17:36 <EEG> Sorry, can I ask my question again?  
17:37 <EEG> I have a problem with diagrams created with the Diagram Application. I can see diagrams in Chrome browser, but IE 11 shows the source XML text. What should I do to make diagrams visible in IE?  
17:37 <vmassol> is it svg?  
17:37 <vmassol> (EEG)  
17:38 <vmassol> can you paste the xml you have on pastebin for examepl?  
17:38 <EEG> I am not a xwiki guru and don't have access to the XWIKI server. May be I can do something on my machine to set IE properly?  
17:38 <vmassol> this is not related to xwiki actually  
17:38 <vmassol> can you paste the xml you have on pastebin for examepl?  
17:39 <EEG> Here is a part of the text:  
17:39 <EEG> <mxGraphModel dx="800" dy="800" grid="1" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="826" pageHeight="1169" style="default-style2"> <root> <mxCell id="0"/> <mxCell id="1" parent="0"/> <mxCell id="52" value="" style="dashed=1;opacity=100;strokeColor=#3399FF" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="90" y="800" width="550" height="210" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="25" value="" style="dashed=1;opacity=  
17:39 <vmassol> that's the top?  
17:39 <vmassol> nothing before?  
17:40 <vmassol> (that would be strange)  
17:40 <EEG> On top there is a normal wiki page header  
17:41 <vmassol> I need a paste on pastebin to help you  
17:41 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
17:41 <EEG> The header looks the same in Chrome and IE, but the diagram is bad in IE :(  
17:42 <EEG> @vmassol - Sorry what is the pastebin?  
17:42 <vmassol> google it  
17:42 <vmassol> http://pastebin.com/  
17:43 <vmassol> hmm http://myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/WikiManager/ is really slow, I cannot get it to list wikis…  
17:43 <vmassol> ah at last it displayed  
17:43 <vmassol> we may have a perf issue when there are lots of wikis  
17:43 <vmassol> it doesn't seem to scale gdelhumeau  
17:44 <EEG> Here is the pastebin - http://pastebin.com/M3bWciak  
17:45 <vmassol> EEG: could you paste what you get in view source please?  
17:47 <tmortagne> has quit  
17:47 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: the plan take place in memory indeed  
17:48 <EEG> @vmassol - sorry, the pastebin tells - "Request denied by WatchGuard Firewall." What can I do else?  
17:51 <EEG> Error message from pastebin: "Reason: IPS detected for "WEB Cross-Site Scripting -7/Web Attack"  
17:59 <EEG> @vmassol: I uploaded the file here http://www.pastefile.com/qIM6xM  
18:10 <ClemensR> has quit  
18:22 <mrvis> has quit  
18:23 <vmassol> EEG: ok thanks. I've checked it but I don't understand the problem  
18:23 <vmassol> it outputs XML and not HTML  
18:23 <avisser> has joined #xwiki  
18:25 <EEG> I also think it can't interpret XML. May be a some java servlet should be enabled on the local machine?  
18:28 <vmassol> that's what I wanted to check but no, there's no magic and the xml is also escaped btw  
18:29 <vmassol> it just means that during the rendering the xml should have generated some image and it didn't  
18:29 <vmassol> but I don't know why  
18:30 <EEG> @vmassol: Your explanation sounds reasonable. What is your suggestion?  
18:30 <vmassol> debug the diagram app but I don't have the time to do that for you  
18:30 <vmassol> alternative: stop using IE :)  
18:31 <vmassol> mflorea: I've created http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13193  
18:34 <EEG> @vmassol: thank you. Can I refer you somebody in the XWIKI team for the problem resolution?  
18:34 <vmassol> this extension is not supported by the xwiki core dev team. You can find who's the creator on the extension page for it though  
18:36 <EEG> OK. Thank you.  
18:36 <EEG> has left #xwiki
